    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Account
     
    AccountAttendanceDao
     
    AccountAttendanceDto
    Data Transfer Object representing attendance information for an account.
    AccountAttendanceService
     
    AccountClass
    Many-to-Many relation model between Account and SystemClass
    AccountController
     
    AccountDao
     
    AccountFullInfoDao
    DAO layer class for account full information retrieval from the database.
    AccountFullInfoDto
    DTO class representing the relation between the Account, Credentials, and Role tables.
    AccountFullInfoService
     
    AccountMiddleware
     
    AccountService
    Service class responsible for managing account-related operations such as functionalities for creating, reading, updating, and deleting account information through the use of the AccountDao layer class.
    AccountUtility
     
    AlreadyAuthenticatedException
    Exception thrown when an already authenticated user attempts to authenticate again.
    App
     
    AppAction
    Enum representing all possible user actions within the app.
    AppBuilder
    Main Javalin app builder.
    AppEndpoint
    Enumeration representing all available app endpoints which can be used by all controllers as a starting point to build their endpoints.
    AppException
    Custom generic App Exception for application-specific errors handling.
    AuthController
     
    AuthMiddleware
     
    AuthUtility
     
    ClassDto
     
    ClassMemberController
     
    ClassMemberDao
     
    ClassMemberDto
     
    ClassMemberService
     
    ContextUtil
    Utility class providing helper methods for handling Javalin context operations such as IDs obtaining invalid input: '&' auto-validation.
    Credentials
     
    CredentialsDao
     
    CredentialsService
    Service class responsible for managing credentials-related operations such as functionalities for creating, reading, updating, and deleting credentials information through the use of the
    invalid reference 
    CredentialsDao
    layer class.
    DatabaseConnection
     
    DatabaseConnectionException
    Exception thrown when there are issues connecting to the database.
    DatabaseQueryException
    Exception thrown when there is an error during any database query operation.
    DatabaseWriteDao<T>
    Interface providing methods for creation, update, and deletion on a relational database through an active Connection.
    DataFetchException
    Exception thrown when there is an error while fetching data from the database Returns HTTP status code 400 (Bad Request) when thrown.
    EmailSendingException
    Exception thrown when there is a failure while sending an Email.
    EndpointsRegister
     
    Environment
    Utility class used to load load environmental variables from a .env file.
    Hashing
    Utility class for strings hashing and verification using Argon2id hashing algorithm (Spring Security Crypto invalid input: '&' BouncyCastle).
    InvalidCredentialsException
    Exception thrown when user credentials are invalid.
    IsLoggedInMiddleware
    Middleware class for handling user authentication state checks.
    JoinDatabaseReadDao<T>
    Interface for read operations on a relational database tables with joined relationships (e.g.
    JsonWebToken
    Utility class to sign and verify JWTs through HMAC256 algorithm.
    JwtDao
    RedisDao implementation for JWT operations in Redis.
    JwtData
    A data class representing the most useful JWT information such as the JWT token itself, its unique identifier (JTI), associated Account's acocuntId, and expiration time claims (represented in JWT's EPOCH Seconds time unit).
    JwtService
     
    Lesson
     
    LessonAttendance
    Many-to-Many relation model between Account and Lesson
    LessonAttendanceDao
     
    LessonAttendanceService
     
    LessonController
     
    LessonDao
     
    LessonDto
     
    LessonMiddleware
     
    LessonService
     
    LessonUtility
    Utility class providing helper methods for Lesson operations.
    MailingSystemConnectionException
    Exception thrown when there are issues while trying to connect to the mailing system.
    MailSender
    Singleton class used to send emails through SMTP.
    MiddlewareExecutor
    Utility class for executing Javalin Handler middleware methods based on HTTP request method.
    NotFoundException
    Exception thrown when no data was found while fetching from a data soruce (such as DB or Redis) Returns HTTP status code 404 (Not Found) when thrown.
    NoticeTemplate
    Utility class providing HTML templates for system notices.
    PasswordHashingException
    Exception thrown when string hashing fails.
    Rbac
    Utility class for role-based access control functionality.
    RedisConnection
     
    RedisConnectionException
    Exception thrown when there are issues while connecting to Redis.
    RedisDao
    Interface for Redis data access operations.
    ResponseDto<T>
    Response class for a consistent response body.
    ResponseDto.ResponseBuilder<T>
     
    SimpleDatabaseReadDao<T>
    Base DAO layer interface providing basic read operations.
    Sql
    Utility class to simplify and speed up the queries and statements development.
    SystemClass
     
    SystemClassController
     
    SystemClassDao
     
    SystemClassMiddleware
    Middleware handler for System Class related endpoints.
    SystemClassService
     
    SystemClassUtility
    Utility class providing helper methods for SystemClass operations.

    SystemNoticeController

    SystemRole
     
    SystemRoleDao
     
    SystemRoleService
     
    TokenGenerationException
    Exception thrown when auth token generation fails.
    TokenValidationException
    Exception thrown when token validation fails (e.g. expired token) Returns HTTP status code 401 (Unauthorized) when thrown.
    UnauthorizedException
     
    UserRole
     
    UserRolesConstants
     
    ValidationException
    Exception thrown when the values passed in the request appear to be invalid after a validation process.
